name: Kukulu - Full Version
description:
Kukulu is an addictive runner game that will keep you entertained for hours. You escape from the farmer by jumping over fences, running through bushes...you get the idea!

It’s the perfect game to play when you have some free time and want to challenge yourself. The gameplay is simple but challenging, so it’s easy enough for anyone to pick up and enjoy!

You can play the campaign mode or just run around collecting coins. There are tons of different power-ups and obstacles that make every round unique!

Inspired by African culture, Kukulu provides you with a unique experience that is built into every character, scenery, and music. So what are you waiting for? Give it a try today!
